Treecker package documentation
===============================

Welcome!
This documentation has been carefully prepared to help you use the Treecker package.
The :doc:`first section <practice/index>` provides installation instructions and usage examples.
The :doc:`second section <package/treecker>` documents the package code.
Hopefully you will find the information you are looking for!
